dct_title_s: Les deserts d'Egypte, de Thebaide d'Arabie, de Sirie, &c
dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "Lieues du chemin".
Features illustrations of ships, people, settlements, animals throughout.
Shows topography, vegetation, drainage, boundaries, places of historical interest.
Decorative cartouche with illustrations of holy men.
